name: The Block
title: Utf8b8jutw Postus Election Honeymoon Is Over
text:
Synopsis
The crypto market is experiencing a post-election cooldown, with macroeconomic factors and monetary policy reasserting their influence on asset flows and token prices.

Key Insights
- CoinShares reports crypto investment products saw modest net inflows of $48 million, followed by significant outflows of $940 million due to macroeconomic data and Federal Reserve signals
- Bitcoin-based funds added $214 million, while Ethereum-based products saw $256 million in net outflows
- AI agent tokens experienced a significant price correction, with some tokens dropping 50% in value
- Tether plans to relocate to El Salvador, acquiring a Digital Asset Service Provider license
- MoonPay acquired Solana payments app Helio for $175 million, expanding crypto payment infrastructure
- MicroStrategy continued its Bitcoin acquisition, purchasing 2,530 BTC for $243 million, bringing total holdings to 450,000 BTC
- Animecoin, backed by Azuki, unveiled tokenomics with 50.5% of its 10 billion token supply allocated to community distribution
